title: Have you contacted DWP and asked them to reconsider their decision?
subtitle: You can still appeal if you have contacted DWP about their decision about the PIP benefit but you don’t have the MRN letter. For example, because you lost it.

haveContactedDWP.yes: Yes, I’ve contacted DWP about the decision
haveContactedDWP.no: No, I haven’t contacted DWP about the decision

error.required: You need to say whether you contacted DWP about their decision. Selecet either yes or no
